name: Final Fantasy XIV: Stormblood
description:
Final Fantasy XIV: Stormblood is a RPG massively multiplayer game developed by Square Enix. It came out on 20-06-2017. It was published by Square Enix. Final Fantasy XIV: Stormblood has a Metascore of 88, based on professional reviews. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG.
You can play Final Fantasy XIV: Stormblood on PC and PlayStation 4.
Naoki Yoshida produced the game. It was directed by Naoki Yoshida. It was scored by Masayoshi Soken and Nobuo Uematsu.
